name: Gravity Shapes
description:
THIS GAME IS IN BETA, FULL GAME COMING SOON!!

Gravity Shapes is a simple game, you are a square and you need to complete the levels. Purple blocks are called Gravity blocks, they change your gravity. There is a teleporter at the end of the level, it is used to teleport to other levels and beat the game. Have fun!

The map is located on the right of the page. It will also pop up in-game.
